mapper.update: update myscoremanage. income set income = income+#{money} where companyID = #{companyID} and yearMonth = #{yearMonth}
mapper.select: select * from myscoremanage. income where companyID = #{companyID} and yearMonth = #{yearMonth}
select * from myscoremanage. income where companyID = #{companyID} and yearMonth between #{year} and #{year}+100
